original: Curbcrawler is taking skate fashion back to the street! Deliberately-distressed t-shirts are so easy to rip off! We are unloading all our old crap for $5 an item! Clothes so ragged that your mom will never notice when you drop a hot rock!
translated: Curbcrawler正在将滑板时尚带回街头！刻意仿古的短袖很容易脱手！这些旧衣服统统$5一件！衣服破烂到拉屎都不会被你妈发现！
